page.title: 10PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: One of our favourite games is Downhill Chickens.This is how you play. 1. Upto ten people can play. 2. The person who is 'on' is called the snake.All the others are called chickens. 3. The snake has to count upto ten slowly while the chickes run out of the den. 4. Each person has to run with their hands on their knees. 5. The snake has to 'dob' a chicken before they can get back to the den. 6. If anyone takes their hands off their knees they are automatically 'on'. 7. If the snake 'dobs' a chicken, that chicken is the new snake and the old snake becomes a chicken.
